title: Boost Recovery with Full Body Stretch Yoga for Athletes
description:
This is a Breathe and Flow yoga class for athletes to boost recovery. Also very suitable as a beginner yoga class. When resting you don't want to go crazy with your practice but still move the body a little. This class is ideal for that!

🧘 Breathe and Flow membership platform (free 7 day trial!): https://practice.breatheandflow.yoga
🌈  Daily yoga 30 day calendars: https://www.breatheandflow.yoga/ritual
✉️ Join the newsletter: https://newsletter.breatheandflow.yoga/
🐺 More of the wolfpack:

☯️ Structural integration bodywork with Flo: https://bit.ly/FLO-SI

Music: Forsythia - Isaac Joel

00:00 Introduction
00:40 Practice

***

Breathe and Flow is a yoga and lifestyle channel owned by Bre and Flo Niedhammer. Knowing that the body benefits from movement while the mind benefits from stillness, we share our philosophy of mental stillness through the fluidity of a strong practice. Bre and Flo are Registered Yoga Teachers (RYT) with Yoga Alliance® holding the highest certifications as E-RYT500, and are also Yoga Alliance Continuing Education Providers (YACEP). Combined they are trained in Vinyasa yoga, Hatha yoga, Yin yoga, Myofascial Release (MFR), pre- and postnatal yoga, Functional Movement, Animal Flow, Kinstretch, Functional Range Conditioning (FRC) mobility training, Functional Range Assessment (FRA) and Anatomy Trains Structural. Bre and Flo have taught at several premium yoga studios for many years and are teaching their teacher trainings, retreats, and workshops around the world. They currently live in Las Vegas, Nevada, USA. Learn more about them and their certifications on their website: https://www.breatheandflow.yoga/about

Our disclaimer: https://www.breatheandflow.yoga/disclaimer

#breatheandflow #yoga #yogawithbnf

comments: I love everything about this: the session, the pace, the instructor, the dialog and his voice, the background...all of it. Please do more 30 minutes recovery stretch for athlete videos!
Your commitment to self-care and mindfulness shines brightly. Keep nurturing your mind, body, and soul through every breath and pose. Gratitude for being a part of our yoga community. Namaste.

Summary: I feel relaxed aha

As far as beginner classes go I think this was spot-on. He constantly reminded the viewer to go with the stretch where it was comfortable. I felt like as long as I focused on my breathing and my body’s positioning I really was putting the work in. Grounding my palms reeeeeally helped w/not overworking my shoulders.

Dude thank you soooo much. I’m a powerlifter and man I needed this. I can deadlift 760lbs but I couldn’t even hold the downward dog without my triceps giving out LOL I’m going to do all your flows daily. I appreciate your videos so much
I fell asleep at the last position, no ones talking and then I realized it ended already.  It's relaxing, thanks man.
